at.spengergasse.entities

Class AdvancedEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.spengergasse.entities.Entity
      • at.spengergasse.entities.AdvancedEntity

  • public class AdvancedEntity
extends Entity
    AdvancedEntities are every Player and Enemies. The AdvancedEntity class is a subclass of Entity.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdvancedEntity

        public AdvancedEntity(int x,
                      int y,
                      java.lang.String shapePath,
                      int tileSize,
                      int health,
                      int type)
               throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Constructs a new AdvancedEntity.
        Parameters:
        x - the X Coordinate (coordinate origin is the upon left corner)
        y - the Y Coordinate (coordinate origin is the upon left corner)
        shapePath - the Path where the Shape is
        tilesize - how big one Pixel is
        health - the hit points (HP)
        type - the Type (0 = Player; 1 = Enemy lvl.1; 2 = Enemy lvl.2; 3 = Enemy lvl.3; 4 = Boss)
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • shoot

        public SimpleEntity shoot(int xOffset,
                          int yOffset,
                          int speed,
                          int damage,
                          int momentumX,
                          int momentumY,
                          int modolX,
                          int modolY,
                          java.lang.String pathShape)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Makes a new SimpleEntity and shoots.
        Parameters:
        xOffset - how far the shot spawns on the x axis from the coordinate origin of the AdvancedEntity
        yOffset - how far the shot spawns on the y axis from the coordinate origin of the AdvancedEntity
        speed - how fast it travels
        damage - the damage
        momentumX - the momentum on the x axis
        momentumY - the momentum on the Y axis
        modolX - veer on the x axis
        modolY - veer on the y axis
        shapePath - the Path where the Shape is
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
